attributes.comment: I strongly oppose the proposed Schedule F rule. This would undermine the civil service system that has served our country well for generations.
attributes.title: Opposition to Schedule F

attributes.comment: I support the Schedule F proposal as it will allow agencies to better address performance issues and increase accountability.
attributes.title: Support for Schedule F

attributes.comment: The proposed rule raises significant concerns about due process rights for federal employees and could lead to politicization of the civil service.
attributes.title: Concerns about Due Process
